history: Update Notifier (1.0.9)25-04-2012Shows changelog when vApus detects an update.HotFix Monitor View (1.0.8)24-04-2012It was impossible to monitor while stresstesting because the counters were not filled in correctly.Connection View (1.0.7)24-04-2012The connection route can be traced from this view.Connection Proxy Code View (1.0.7)23-04-2012Updates the panel while scrolling now.Bug reporting (1.0.6)18-04-2012It is now possible to report bugs from the application log panel in vApus to Sizing Servers.Custom List Parameters (1.0.5)17-04-2012Removed label control from generate from type dialog.Can now be generated from custom random parameter.Custom Random Parameter (1.0.5)16-04-2012Added line numbersTest code button now instead of try compile.Numeric Parameters (1.0.5)13-04-2012Decimal separator can be set here.Flat style controls (1.0.5)13-04-2012For parameters and connection proxy GUI.Stopping a scheduled test (1.0.4)13-04-2012A stresstest could not be stopped before the test was actually started (while the schedule timer was running).Fixed Connection Proxy Code Scrolling (1.0.3)12-04-2012When clicking around the view was very prone to scroll to the wrong place.HotFix Connection Proxy Code (1.0.2)10-04-2012Connections could not be tested from here anymore.HotFix Parameters (1.0.1)28-03-2012Numeric parameters did not always respect its given boundaries.First Master Build (1.0.0 DUBLIN)14-03-2012Codename DUBLIN
